member.summary: Fires when the ObjectFactory is refreshed

member.name: P:StructureMap.ObjectFactory.Profile
member.summary: Gets or sets the current named profile. When set, overrides the default object instances according to the configured profile in StructureMap.config

member.name: T:StructureMap.Graph.PluginFamily
member.summary: Conceptually speaking, a PluginFamily object represents a point of abstraction or variability in the system. A PluginFamily defines a CLR Type that StructureMap can build, and all of the possible Plugin’s implementing the CLR Type.

member.name: T:StructureMap.Interceptors.InstanceFactoryInterceptor
member.summary: Base "Decorator" class around IInstanceFactory to alter the object creation process for a PluginType. The SingletonInterceptor is an example subclass that ensures that only one instance is created for a given InstanceKey as a more testable alternative to the GoF Singleton pattern.

member.name: T:StructureMap.Graph.Plugin
member.summary: Represents a concrete class that can be built by StructureMap as an instance of the parent PluginFamily’s PluginType. The properties of a Plugin are the CLR Type of the concrete class, and the human-friendly concrete key that StructureMap will use to identify the Type.

member.name: M:StructureMap.Graph.Plugin.GetPlugins(System.Reflection.Assembly,System.Type)
member.summary: Finds an array of Plugin objects for a given PluginType in an Assembly object by searching for all exported types marked with [Pluggable] that can be cast to the PluginType

member.name: M:StructureMap.Graph.Plugin.CanBePluggedIn(System.Type,System.Type)
member.summary: Determines if the PluggedType is a valid Plugin into the PluginType

member.name: M:StructureMap.Graph.Plugin.CanBeCast(System.Type,System.Type)
member.summary: Determines if the PluggedType can be upcast to the PluginType

member.name: M:StructureMap.Graph.Plugin.CreateImplicitPlugin(System.Type)
member.summary: Creates an Implicit Plugin that discovers its ConcreteKey from a [Pluggable] attribute on the PluggedType

member.name: M:StructureMap.Graph.Plugin.CreateExplicitPlugin(System.Type,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates an Explicit Plugin for the pluggedType with the entered concreteKey

member.name: M:StructureMap.Graph.Plugin.#ctor(System.Type,System.String,StructureMap.Graph.DefinitionSource)
member.summary: Creates an Explicit Plugin for the pluggedType with the entered concreteKey

member.name: M:StructureMap.Graph.Plugin.#ctor(StructureMap.Graph.TypePath,System.String)
member.summary: Troubleshooting constructor used by PluginGraphBuilder to find possible problems with the configured Plugin

member.name: M:StructureMap.Graph.Plugin.GetConstructor
member.summary: Returns the System.Reflection.ConstructorInfo for the PluggedType. Uses either the "greediest" constructor with the most arguments or the constructor function marked with the [DefaultConstructor]

member.name: M:StructureMap.Graph.Plugin.GetInstanceBuilderClassName
member.summary: Gets a class name for the InstanceBuilder that will be emitted for this Plugin

member.name: M:StructureMap.Graph.Plugin.HasConstructorArguments
member.summary: Boolean flag denoting the presence of any constructor arguments

member.name: M:StructureMap.Graph.Plugin.CreateImplicitMemento
member.summary: Creates an InstanceMemento for a PluggedType that requires no configuration. I.e. a CLR Type that has no constructor functions or is marked as "[AutoFilled]"

member.name: P:StructureMap.Graph.Plugin.ConcreteKey
member.summary: The ConcreteKey that identifies the Plugin within a PluginFamily

member.name: P:StructureMap.Graph.Plugin.PluggedType
member.summary: The concrete CLR Type represented by the Plugin

member.name: P:StructureMap.Graph.Plugin.ValidationMethods
member.summary: Finds any methods on the PluggedType marked with the [ValidationMethod] attributes

member.name: P:StructureMap.Graph.Plugin.Setters
member.summary: Property's that will be filled by setter injection

member.name: P:StructureMap.Graph.Plugin.DefinitionSource
member.summary: Denotes the source or the definition for this Plugin. Implicit means the Plugin is defined by a [Pluggable] attribute on the PluggedType. Explicit means the Plugin was defined in the StructureMap.config file.

member.name: P:StructureMap.Graph.Plugin.CanBeAutoFilled
member.summary: Determines if the concrete class can be autofilled.

member.name: T:StructureMap.Graph.AssemblyGraph
member.summary: Models an assembly reference in a PluginGraph

member.name: M:StructureMap.Graph.AssemblyGraph.GetAllAssembliesAtPath(System.String)
member.summary: Finds a string array of all the assembly files in a path. Used by the UI

member.name: M:StructureMap.Graph.AssemblyGraph.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Creates an AssemblyGraph, traps exceptions to troubleshoot configuration issues

member.name: M:StructureMap.Graph.AssemblyGraph.FindPluginFamilies
member.summary: Returns an array of all the CLR Type's in the Assembly that are marked as [PluginFamily]

member.name: M:StructureMap.Graph.AssemblyGraph.FindPlugins(System.Type)
member.summary: Returns an array of possible Plugin's from the Assembly that match the requested type

member.name: P:StructureMap.Graph.AssemblyGraph.AssemblyName
member.summary: Short name of the Assembly

member.name: P:StructureMap.Graph.AssemblyGraph.InnerAssembly
member.summary: Reference to the System.Reflection.Assembly object

member.name: P:StructureMap.Graph.AssemblyGraph.LookForPluginFamilies
member.summary: Used to control whether or not the assembly should be searched for implicit attributes

member.name: T:StructureMap.Exceptions.InstancePropertyValueException
member.summary: Thrown by IProperty classes when an invalid value is applied to a property of an InstanceGraph

member.name: T:StructureMap.Caching.EagerInstanceCache
member.summary: Summary description for EagerInstanceCache.

member.name: T:StructureMap.StructureMapException
member.summary: Main exception for StructureMap. Use the ErrorCode to aid in troubleshooting StructureMap problems

member.name: T:StructureMap.PluginFamilyAttribute
member.summary: Declares a class, abstract class, or interface to be the target of a PluginFamily in the container

member.name: M:StructureMap.PluginFamilyAttribute.MarkedAsPluginFamily(System.Type)
member.summary: Determines if a Type object is marked as a PluginFamily

member.name: M:StructureMap.PluginFamilyAttribute.GetDefaultKey(System.Type)
member.summary: Gets the default instance key from a Type marked as a PluginFamily

member.name: M:StructureMap.PluginFamilyAttribute.IsMarkedAsSingleton(System.Type)
member.summary: Interrogates the attribute on the pluginType and determines if the PluginFamily is marked as a Singleton

member.name: P:StructureMap.PluginFamilyAttribute.Scope
member.summary: If set, determines the shared "scope" of the instance -- PerRequest, Singleton, ThreadLocal, HttpContext, etc.

member.name: P:StructureMap.PluginFamilyAttribute.DefaultKey
member.summary: InstanceKey of the default instance. Used to implicitly define the default without declaring the instance in StructureMap.config

member.name: P:StructureMap.PluginFamilyAttribute.IsSingleton
member.summary: Declares the target to be built by StructureMap as a Singleton. One object instance will be created for each named instance

member.name: T:StructureMap.XmlMapping.InstanceDefaultManagerMapper
member.summary: Reads and Writes InstanceDefaultManager's from and to Xml configuration

member.name: T:StructureMap.Verification.PluginGraphConsoleWriter
member.summary: Creates a textual report summarizing the StructureMap configuration of an application, including any implicitly defined PluginFamily's and Plugin's marked by attributes

member.name: T:StructureMap.Source.XmlNodeInstanceMemento
member.summary: Implementation of InstanceMemento that stores information in a node-normalized Xml format.

member.name: T:StructureMap.PluginGraphBuilder
member.summary: Reads configuration XML documents and builds the structures necessary to initialize the InstanceManager/IInstanceFactory/InstanceBuilder/ObjectInstanceActivator objects

member.name: M:StructureMap.PluginGraphBuilder.BuildDefaultPluginGraph
member.summary: Creates a PluginGraph from the "StructureMap.config" file in the application folder

member.name: M:StructureMap.PluginGraphBuilder.GetStructureMapConfigurationPath
member.summary: Returns the path to the StructureMap.config file

member.name: M:StructureMap.PluginGraphBuilder.#ctor(System.Xml.XmlNode)
member.summary: Creates a PluginGraphBuilder from a %lt;StructureMap%gt; node

member.name: M:StructureMap.PluginGraphBuilder.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a PluginGraphBuilder that reads configuration from the filePath
member.param: The path to the configuration file

member.name: M:StructureMap.PluginGraphBuilder.#ctor
member.summary: Default constructor reads configuration from the StructureMap.config file in the application folder

member.name: M:StructureMap.PluginGraphBuilder.Build
member.summary: Reads the configuration information and returns the PluginGraph definition of plugin families and plugin's

member.name: M:StructureMap.PluginGraphBuilder.BuildDiagnosticPluginGraph
member.summary: Build a PluginGraph with all instances calculated. Used in the UI and diagnostic tools.

member.name: T:StructureMap.StubbedInstanceFactory
member.summary: Decorator that intercepts a call to create a PluginType and returns a static mock or stub. Used when ObjectFactory.InjectStub(Type, object) is called.

member.name: M:StructureMap.StubbedInstanceFactory.GetInstance(System.String)
member.summary: Creates an object instance for the InstanceKey
member.param: The named instance

member.name: M:StructureMap.StubbedInstanceFactory.GetInstance(StructureMap.InstanceMemento)
member.summary: Creates an object instance directly from the Memento
member.param: A representation of an object instance

member.name: M:StructureMap.StubbedInstanceFactory.GetInstance
member.summary: Creates a new object instance of the default instance memento

member.name: M:StructureMap.Source.EmbeddedFolderXmlMementoSource.#ctor(StructureMap.Source.XmlMementoStyle,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Implementation of MementoSource that stores and retrieves an XmlInstanceMemento per Embedded Resource file in a named namespace. EmbeddedFolderXmlMementoSource is meant to simplify complicated object graph configurations by isolating each instance to a separate editable file.
member.param: NodeNormalized or AttributeNormalized
The name of the Assembly with the embedded resources
The root namespace of all of the mementos.
The file extension of the memento files - "xml"

member.name: T:StructureMap.InstanceBuilder
member.summary: Base class for creating an object instance from an InstanceMemento. SubClasses are emitted for each concrete Plugin with constructor parameters.

member.name: T:StructureMap.Graph.MachineOverride
member.summary: Models the machine-level overrides for default instances per plugin type.

member.name: M:StructureMap.Graph.MachineOverride.AddMachineOverride(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Registers an override for the default instance of a certain plugin type.

member.name: M:StructureMap.Graph.MachineOverride.HasOverride(System.String)
member.summary: Determines if the MachineOverride instance has an overriden default for the plugin type

member.name: M:StructureMap.Graph.MachineOverride.FilterOutNonExistentPluginTypes(StructureMap.Configuration.PluginGraphReport)
member.summary: Filters instance defaults for plugin types that are no longer contained by the PluginGraph

member.name: P:StructureMap.Graph.MachineOverride.DefaultKey(System.String)
member.summary: Finds the default key for a plugin type

member.name: P:StructureMap.Graph.MachineOverride.ProfileName
member.summary: If the MachineOverride has a Profile, returns the profile name

member.name: T:StructureMap.Emitting.Parameters.EnumParameterEmitter
member.summary: Implementation of ParameterEmitter for enumeration types

member.name: T:StructureMap.Emitting.Parameters.ChildParameterEmitter
member.summary: Implementation of ParameterEmitter for a non-primitive, non-array constructor argument

member.name: M:StructureMap.Source.SingleEmbeddedXmlMementoSource.#ctor(System.String,StructureMap.Source.XmlMementoStyle,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves Xml InstanceMemento's from an xml file stored as an embedded resource in an assembly.
member.param: Designates the nodes that are memento nodes
NodeNormalized or AttributeNormalized
The name of the Assembly the file is embedded into
The path to the embedded resource within the file

member.name: T:StructureMap.Source.DirectoryXmlMementoSource
member.summary: Implementation of MementoSource that stores and retrieves an XmlInstanceMemento per file in a named directory. DirectoryXmlMementoSource is meant to simplify complicated object graph configurations by isolating each instance to a separate editable file.

member.name: M:StructureMap.Source.DirectoryXmlMementoSource.#ctor(System.String,System.String,StructureMap.Source.XmlMementoStyle)
member.summary: Stores an Xml InstanceMemento per file in a directory
member.param: A ";" delimited list of directories to look for mementos. DirectoryXmlMementoSource will use the FIRST directory it finds
The file extension of the InstanceMemento files without a dot. Typically "xml"
NodeNormalized or AttributeNormalized

member.summary: Manages the setup and teardown of a new AppDomain to test a StructureMap configuration.

member.summary: A collection of InstanceDefault's overriding the default instances

member.summary: Manages a list of InstanceFactoryInterceptor's. Design-time model of an array of decorators to alter the InstanceFactory behavior for a PluginType.

member.name: T:StructureMap.Graph.DefinitionSource
member.summary: Specifies whether a PluginGraphObject is defined Explicitly in the configuration file, or implicitly through the [PluginFamily] or [Pluggable] attributes

member.summary: Default implementation of IInstanceFactory
